title: Player tool tips/Friends list
body:
As per patch notes last patch (5.3), weren't we supposed to be getting updated player tool tips on the friends list? In the new patch not only do we not have that, we lost the ability to see what champion they're playing as.

What is going on?

replies.body:
They said they were working on it in those notes, not that we'd actually get it on that patch. It's scheduled for the next patch after the one we're currently on (5.5), but of course, they *can* (and probably will) hold it off for even longer.

Regarding the inability to see who they're playing as, that's a known issue with the tool tips that Riot hopes to fix with this update. It's been happening since forever, not just on patch 5.3.
